data.message: I received an email that my acct may have been hacked. How do I know it's from Facebook?

replies.message: Log into your facebook from facebook.com. If it works you're fine. Just delete the message. DO NOT CLICK ANY LINK IN THE MESSAGE. This is usually just phishing.

Hi Judy. Facebook will never request your password over email, and we advise against providing your information to anyone under any circumstances. Please report this message as spam by going to the conversation, clicking the gear icon in the upper-right corner and select Report as Spam. Thanks! -Hailey
